title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting derby database
OB: When expanding the 'Data Source' in the 'Available Items' sector, the column icons do not appear.
EB: When expanding the 'Data Source' in the 'Available Items' sector, both table and column icons should appear.
SR: Steps to Reproduce: 1. Create a new project. 2. Create a new report. 3. In the 'Data Explorer' view, create a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database using the following details: Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver, Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui, User Name: root, Password: root. 4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset. 5. In the 'Edit Data Set' window, select 'Query'. 6. [Further steps are missing, please provide additional steps to reproduce the issue.]
